scripts.build: npm run build:bundle && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build:css: cat css/app.css | cleancss -o build/app.min.css && cat css/viewer.css | cleancss -o build/viewer.min.css
scripts.build:js: browserify js/app.js --no-bundle-external | uglifyjs -o build/app.min.js -c -m && browserify js/viewer.js --no-bundle-external | uglifyjs -o build/viewer.min.js -c -m
